channel.title: Git on tool
channel.description: Recent content in Git on tool

item.title: Github
item.description: Github setup Signup account with Github and create a repo “tool”, enable 2 step verification Enable ssh connection to Github connect to Github through ssh 1 # generate ssh keys cd ~/.ssh ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "wedgevine@outlook.com" -f "id_rsa_wedgevine" Adding a new SSH key to your GitHub account Per 1, create ~/.ssh/config file for each Github account Setting the git remote Url for the local repositories
